title: Buy United Technologies Stock Now, Not After Its Split and Merger, Analyst Says
text:
Since United Technologies announced plans for a $50 billion blockbuster deal to merge with defense contractor Raytheon the combined value of both entities has dropped by about 1%, or $2 billion. The S&P 500, by comparison, has gained 2% since the June 9 announcement.

Investors, it seems, aren’t too enthused about the combination, which will create an aerospace and defense giant. Still, Cowen analyst Cai von Rumohr is bullish on United Tech’s aerospace division and recommends buying stock in the company today.

...
description: Cowen analyst Cai von Rumohr is bullish on United Technologies’ aerospace division and recommends buying stock in the company today, not waiting until after its split and subsequent merger with Raytheon.
